profile.name: MP4-H264/AAC Instagram Reels (720p) - (Default)
profile.args: f=mp4 vcodec=libx264 width=1280 height=720 display_aspect_num=9 display_aspect_den=16 frame_rate_num=30 frame_rate_den=1 crf=%quality vmaxrate=%bitrate+'k' g=15 bf=0 acodec=aac ab=%audiobitrate+'k' movflags=+faststart pix_fmt=yuv420p real_time=-1 threads=0

profile.name: MP4-H264/AAC Instagram Reels (1080p)
profile.args: f=mp4 vcodec=libx264 width=1920 height=1080 display_aspect_num=9 display_aspect_den=16 frame_rate_num=30 frame_rate_den=1 crf=%quality vmaxrate=%bitrate+'k' g=15 bf=0 acodec=aac ab=%audiobitrate+'k' movflags=+faststart pix_fmt=yuv420p real_time=-1 threads=0
